Description: MIt starts with the most coveted location in Las Vegas, overlooking the Fountains of Bellagio. The space itself is built on mystery and is said to have been the opulent Italian villa of a famed Renaissance artist, who tailored seductive grand festival masks. With an eclectic and refined taste, the artist fashioned his surroundings with worldly treasures, complemented by Italian marbles, reclaimed woods, lavish chandeliers, and towering glass doors that led to a secluded Tuscan garden. This is the villa that has been artfully brought back to life by visionary design icon Philippe Starck as Hyde Bellagio.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description:
The exquisitely designed space of this club encompasses everything a guest at the Five Diamond-rated Bellagio has come to expect in nightlife. Hakkasan?s progressive legacy aligned with its unequalled customer service ensures that each client has an exceptional experience.
From a tradition of European bottle service to the exciting, high-energy atmosphere, The Bank earns its reputation as a world-class nightclub destination.

As they enter the stunning 6,600-square-foot space, guests are greeted by a sensuous foyer hinting at the nightlife fantasy within. Elegant VIP booths layer the dance floor in an impressive multi-tiered environment. The glass-encased dance floor, set at the lowest tier, creates a brilliant focal point in the center of the room.
Location: 3600 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
